videoformat: JPEG Sound Files (Voice Memo), AVI (Motion JPEG Compliant)
meteringmodes: Matrix, Center-weighted (Digital Zoom less than 2x), Spot (Digital Zoom 2x or more)
continuousshots: Single (Default Setting), Continuous (the Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting is 1.1 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 6, BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16
weight: 137 g (with Battery and SD Memory Card)
imageformat: File System: DCF, EXIF 2.3, DPOF Compliant
otherfocusfeatures: Focus Area Selecton: Face Priority, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Center, Subject Tracking, Target Finding AF, Digital Zoom Magnification: 35 mm (135) Equivalent 1200 mm, Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Pre-flashes
warrantysummary: 2 year Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
otherconnectivityfeatures: Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, I/O Terminal: Audio / Video (A/V) Output, Digital I/O (USB)
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
shootingmodes: Scene Auto Selector, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Night Landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, Panorama Assist, Pet Portrait), Special Effects, Smart Portrait, Auto
flashfunctions: Auto Flash, Fill-in Flash, Flash Off
shutterspeedinothermodes: 4 sec (when Scene Mode is Set to Fireworks Show)
additionalfeatures: Vibration Reduction: Lens Shift (Still Pictures), Lens Shift and Electronic VR (Movies), Motion Blur Reduction (Still Picture), Tripod Socket: 1/4 (ISO 1222), Charging Time: 2 hr 40 min (when Using Charging AC Adapter EH-70P and when No Charge Remains), Still Pictures: 230 Shots when Using EN-EL19, Electronically Controlled ND Filter (-3.3 AV), Range: F3.5 - F11.1 Aperture 2 Steps, Movie Recording (Actual Battery Life for Recording): 50 min when Using EN-EL19, Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode and Playback Mode): 98% Horizontal and 98% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Smile Timer Continuous Function
whitebalance: Auto, Cloudy (Preset), Daylight / Sunny (Preset), Flash (Preset), Fluorescent (Preset), Incandescent (Preset), Manual
focusrange: 50 cm (1 ft, 8 inch) - Infinity (W), 1.5 m (5 ft) - Infinity (T)
